amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the National Endowment for the Arts and National Endowment for the Humanities, each by $10 million and decrease Strategic Petroleum Reserve funding by $20 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 16 and printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for the National Endowment for the Arts and National Endowment for the Humanities, each by $10 million and decrease Strategic Petroleum Reserve funding by $20 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Slaughter amendment (A016) Failed by recorded vote: 207 - 217 (Roll no. 286).
